titleStmt.title: The Quakers rounds, or, A Faithful account of a large discourse between a party of them called Quakers viz. William Fisher and Edward Burroughs, &c with Mr. Philip Taverner, Mr. Richard Goodgroom, and Mr. M. Hall, ministers of the Gospel ... / published by William Taverner, preacher of the Word.
titleStmt.author: W. F. (William Fisher)
Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Dawson for Lodowick Lloyd ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
